item.title: Essential Reading: Christianity
item.description: Early Christianity St. Augustine of Hippo (354 - 430) City of God Confessions On the Trinity On Christian Doctrine Medieval Christianity St. Thomas Aquinas (1225 - 1274) Summa Theologica Summa Contra Gentiles

Duality of Man: The Effects of Military Rank on Foreign Policy Decision-Making Paper examining the relationship military ranks have on elite decision-making by building upon current research about military training prior to attaining leadership position. Pacem in Terris: The Papacy and Conflict Mediation Paper examining the effects of papal involvement in international conflicts. Just War Theory in the Modern Era Book exploring how Just War Theory has evolved over time and its modern implementations.
